        public Response getMyStudyProtocol(HttpServletRequest request,
                                   java.lang.String typePattern,
                                   java.lang.String namePattern,
                                   java.lang.String revisionPattern,
                                   java.lang.String whereExpression,
                                   java.lang.String expandType,
                                   java.lang.String objectLimit,
                                   java.lang.String objectSelects,
                                   java.lang.String duration,
                                   java.lang.String allowedStates,
                                   java.lang.String showOwned)
        REST method to get Study Protocol details
        Parameters:
        request - HTTPServletRequest for REST service
        TypePattern - The appropriate types for the functionality of the widget
        NamePattern - The appropriate Name for the functionality of the widget
        RevisionPattern - The appropriate revision for the functionality of the widget
        WhereExpression - The where clause, if needed, for the functionality of the widget
        strAllowedStates - The appropriate states for the functionality of PQR widget
        Returns:
        response in JSON format
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when operation fails
